experiences.title: Software Engineer - Integration
experiences.subtitle: Jul 2025 - Present
experiences.description:
As a Software Engineer – Integration, I focus on designing and delivering scalable integration solutions using Boomi and IFS platforms. My responsibilities and contributions include:

  • Designed and implemented integration workflows on Boomi to connect IFS Thor, IFS Cloud, and third-party systems, ensuring seamless data synchronization and process automation.
  • Developed and customized Groovy scripts within Boomi processes to handle complex data transformations, validations, and business logic.
  • Worked on integration architectures, providing input on patterns, best practices, and scalable approaches to enterprise data exchange.
  • Optimized system performance by monitoring, troubleshooting, and enhancing existing integrations for reliability and efficiency.
  • Collaborated with cross-functional teams including architects, business analysts, and QA engineers to gather requirements, refine solutions, and deliver high-quality integrations.
  • Followed Agile methodologies with active participation in sprint planning, daily stand-ups, reviews, retrospectives, and code reviews to ensure continuous improvement and timely delivery.

This role has strengthened my expertise in integration platforms, enterprise application connectivity, and cloud-based solution delivery while deepening my understanding of Agile team collaboration.

experiences.title: Software Engineer - Intern
experiences.subtitle: Dec 2023 - Jul 2024
experiences.description:
As a Software Engineering Intern, I played a key role in enhancing the IDPS generic data distribution framework by integrating cloud-based solutions and improving system functionalities. My contributions include:

  • Developed a data distribution framework using Spring Boot with Maven, integrated with Snowflake Data Warehouse, and deployed it in the AWS environment under the guidance of Software Architects.
  • Introduced and deployed a Wiremock-based feature for endpoint mocking, integrated with AWS Lambda and API Gateway.
  • Created and managed Datadog monitors to track API call latencies, setting up alerts to notify teams of performance issues, leading to faster response times.
  • Collaborated with QA Analysts to fix bugs, contributing to system stability.
  • Integrated various AWS services, including SQS, SNS, Cognito, EC2, Lambda, DynamoDB, and API Gateway, to enhance system capabilities and performance.
  • Enhanced the API Catalog’s frontend (ReactJs, Swagger UI) and backend (Node.js) functionalities, including user-based API gateway restrictions.
  • Actively participated in agile practices, including Sprints and code reviews, while maintaining comprehensive documentation.

This experience provided me with valuable insights into full-stack development, cloud integration, and agile methodologies.
